motivation.para1: Millions of people want to help animals in need. They donate with open hearts, trusting that their money will make a difference.
motivation.para2: But too often, that trust is broken. Scams and fake NGOs have created a
motivation.para2End: that hurts the organizations doing genuine, life-saving work.
motivation.para3End: , we believe transparency is the antidote. We're building a platform where every donation is tracked, every expense is verified, and every NGO earns trust through their actions—not just their words.
